data.message:
hello sir i have a request to you ,my account blocked by facebook due to fake identity ,im real nd i had real account ,i want to verify myself by cell number but facebook dont allow me please open my account for GOD sake please im your old user.
Facebook

replies.message: Hey Shona. If you're locked out of your account, you may have the option to reset your login info. For more information, you can visit our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/1wmRpHg -Sarah
Yeah, you lock out Native Americans claiming "fake name".  You do not need to be asking for any kind of ID.  You're a social network and you create a risk of identity theft.

They are going through and blocking many people for having SUPPOSEDLY FALSE NAMES...  I have had many of my friends lose their accounts due to this issue.  Try and recover them and FACEBOOK still says they are fake.. Had one send them info on their account with a REAL ID and facebook called it a fake id and still left them blocked..   This is total ridiculous..  Getting sick of this whole social media and facebook in general..
